A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie sucked. They destroyed everything that Star Wars was about. The philosophy of the Force\, a powerful\, wise and caring Jedi master willing to train a new hope... They killed Snoke just like that\, Luke was a cranky old man\, there was no training on the island\, Reys' still a Mary Sue\, cause she keeps winning fights untrained. What a mess. So sad they didn't explore or add anything to the saga. Pure action\, nothing of the philosophy of the force. I'm so sad I said J.J wasn't good enough... And George\, come back\, please.
